TopicTitle: Imperial Star Destroyer from Star Wars

Articles.Content:
I build a 2300 stock parts Imperial Star Destroyer II-Class from Star Wars. I made it as accurate as possible with the stock parts.

[Download the craft](http://www./download/t0u6ciwb801il7c/Imperial_Star_Destroyer.craft)

Low FPS Warning! I got max 12 FPS. Have Fun!

![K5mvwWi.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/K5mvwWi.jpg)

[Full album](http://imgur.com/a/34m3I)

A little crash test video of the ship:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zJnuJ40AUUM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-12T18:06:26Z" title="04/12/2015 06:06  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 12, 2015</time> by Space Scumbag**

...Why?

Why is my screen tearing?

Are those cracks?

OH GOD!

THE WORLD HAS BECOME UNDONE!

YOU HAVE DOOMED US ALL!!

Seriusly impressed.
how many time u took to do it? xD
What... What have you done?!?
Wow, such detail. Have you considered welding it together?

> 
> Wow, such detail. Have you considered welding it together?

Yes I already welded it and changed some details, you can see it in the imgur album. The FPS have more than doubled, still it's laggy at some points.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-13T00:08:37Z" title="04/13/2015 12:08  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 13, 2015</time> by Vanamonde**

Wow, now I can expand my kerbal empire to a galaxy far, far, away.

Have some rep.
Yes! Yes! Yes!
Now, give us a Mun sized death star and you will have undoubtedly beaten the internet.

> 
> Now, give us a Mun sized death star and you will have undoubtedly beaten the internet.

Already done, watch this:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PttIcxk23zI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

It's the correct scale of the first Death Star. And you can see more of the Death Star in Part 7.
LOL. Why not to scale? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Congrats on being featured!
My computer nearly crashed just looking at it online!

Looks great, but needs more struts! I used gravity hack to keep it from falling to the ground when launching. When firing the engines, the ship comes apart at the seems! 

I also used HyperEdit to place it in orbit. Looks cool, but still falls apart if the engines are fired.

> 
> Looks great, but needs more struts! I used gravity hack to keep it from falling to the ground when launching. When firing the engines, the ship comes apart at the seems! 
> I also used HyperEdit to place it in orbit. Looks cool, but still falls apart if the engines are fired.

I know, but I welded the craft. So the struts would be redundant.

There is no way to play with it (unwelded) with a bearable framerate. And struts would just increase the part count. So I just left them out, don't need them with the welding mod.

Nice, but my hard limit for anything ill even try to spawn is 1500, and 500 is my absolute limit for enjoyeability (as its no fun to not have a formation of capital ships, if im gonna make 1 ship, id like to have 4+ of them nearby in formation, do you know what 10000 parts will do when spawned in teh same area?! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)).

Anyways, its one of the best replicas ive seen (and ur defenetely not the 1st to make star destroyer, but yours looks ALOT more like the stuff in star wars then most other replicas.

Btw, DOES THIS FLY? If you can manage to get this into orbit (or even move it) without Hedit, ill be amazed.
darn, I was going to build something like this, about that part count too. Nice job. I feel like i've been replaced...

> 
> darn, I was going to build something like this, about that part count too. Nice job. I feel like i've been replaced...

And no one replaced my naval warships. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

It's a dead art.

![yfBxgG4.png](http://i.imgur.com/yfBxgG4.png)

![J7oMvyk.png](http://i.imgur.com/J7oMvyk.png)

I quit just as the ships were reaching the speeds of their real counterparts.

Lol alright and good job btw

Also your latest random compilation came out on my Birthday so thanks for the gift
maybe make a version that is much smaller for video purposes and then you can edit the video and enlarge the ship in the vid but keep a good framerate.

I know. Awesome Teaser! The Hype is real! And Battlefront trailer in just 19 hours. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Can't wait, can't wait, I CAN'T WAIT!

Edit: Btw, now you can see how detailed I made my Star Destroyer. Just compare it to the new video/picture.
Your craft is super impressive, and the post-crash shot reminded me of that scene from the new Star Wars teaser. Some day I will have a computer that can run it.
